content: **materials ** worsted weight yarn in light purple dark purple green black e hook 3 50 mm stuffing scissors tapestry needle **difficulty ** medium you should know how to work in the round increase decrease change colors and do half-double double and triple crochet final piece should measure approximately 6 tall this is an icrochetthings original pattern © 2014-2016 do not claim as your own do not copy sell or distribute this pattern do not sell any products made from this pattern goomy belongs to nintendo
